item.title: Crate & Barrel recalls 3K chairs in Canada after multiple U.S. injuries
item.description: Crate & Barrel has sold 3,175 units of the affected products in Canada and 54,932 in the United States, Health Canada said in a recall notice.

item.title: Canada's economy shrank by 0.3% in August
item.description: Canada's economy shrank in August against widespread expectations of no growth, Statistics Canada data showed on Friday, but an advanced estimate pointed out the economy might escape a recession in the third quarter.

item.title: Supreme Court rules against mandatory minimum child pornography sentences
item.description: The decision affirms a ruling of the Quebec Court of Appeal, which said the mandatory minimum sentences violated the Charter guarantee against cruel or unusual punishment.

item.title: At Issue | Canada-U.S. trade negotiations go off the rails
item.description: At Issue this week: Canada-U.S. trade negotiations go off the rails after an anti-tariff ad angers Trump. Parties accuse each other of trying to force an election over the budget. And was Alberta justified in using the notwithstanding clause to get teachers back to work?
